subject: Baseball
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: Vince, Joe and Dom DiMaggio are the only set of brothers to have been All-Stars. While Vince was the oldest, it was Joe and Dom who developed an intense rivalry in the American League.
snippet: Vince, Joe and Dom DiMaggio are the only set of brothers to have been All-Stars. While Vince was the oldest, it was Joe and Dom who developed an intense rivalry in the American League.
